extension.searchTitle: To reauthorize the Violence Against Women Act of 1994.; Violence Against Women Reauthorization Act of 2013;S. 47 (PCS)

titleInfo.title: To reauthorize the Violence Against Women Act of 1994.
Violence Against Women Reauthorization Act of 2013

extension.shortTitle: Violence Against Women Reauthorization Act of 2013
extension.action: Mr. Leahy (for himself, Mr. Crapo, Ms. Murkowski, Ms. Mikulski, Ms. Ayotte, Mr. Coons, Ms. Collins, Mr. Durbin, Mr. Bennet, Ms. Klobuchar, Mrs. Shaheen, Mrs. McCaskill, Mr. Udall of Colorado, Mr. Kirk, Mrs. Murray, Ms. Cantwell, Mr. Casey, Mrs. Hagan, Mr. Whitehouse, Mr. Tester, Mrs. Feinstein, Mr. Reed, Mr. Franken, Mr. Udall of New Mexico, Mr. Cardin, Mr. Begich, Mr. King, Mr. Wyden, Ms. Warren, Mr. Baucus, Ms. Heitkamp, Mr. Pryor, Ms. Stabenow, Mr. Rockefeller, Mr. Merkley, Mr. Menendez, Mr. Reid, Ms. Baldwin, Mr. Schumer, Mr. Brown, Mr. Heinrich, Mr. Harkin, Ms. Hirono, Mr. Sanders, Mrs. Gillibrand, Mr. Warner, Mr. Blumenthal, Mr. Manchin, Ms. Landrieu, Mr. Levin, and Mr. Lautenberg) introduced the following bill; which was read the first time
Read the second time and placed on the calendar
